settings.heading: Highlights
settings.content:
• 100% Polyester
• The Mens Hawaiian Shirts Are Made Of High Quality Soft Polyester Fabric With Quick To Dry Effect, Maintainning A Silky-Like Skin Contact Feeling.

• Our Hawaiian Mens Shirts Suitable In Many Occasions Including Beach Parties , Theme Parties, Fishing, Sailing, Days at Office Etc.

• The Mens Floral Shirts Are Designed for Different Ages, No Matter Young or Senior With Multiple Colors For Your Selection.

• Exact American Regular Fit Size

• You May Return Back Whenever You Feel Unsatisfied With The Mens Hawaiian Shirts.

settings.heading: Collapsible tab
settings.content:
-Dual Molecular Weight Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates and visibly plumps skins.
-Marine Algae: Provides firmer-, more youthful-looking skin over time.
-Blend of Upcycled Blueberry and Raspberry Seed Oils: Is high in antioxidants to help protect skin from environmental damage.

Aqua (Water), Coco-Caprylate,Dihydroxyacetone,Cetearyl Alcohol, Pentaerythrityl Distearate, Glycerin, Cetearyl Glucoside, Dimethicone,
Ethoxydiglycol, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Alaria Esculenta
Extract, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Vaccinium Myrtillus Seed
Oil, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Juice, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Capryloyl/Capryloyl Leucine Isosorbide Esters, Ceteareth-20, Parfum(Fragrance),Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Cellulose, Xanthan Gum, Isosorbide, Pentaerythrityl
Tetra-Di-t-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Linalool, Hexanediol,Hydroxyacetophenone, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Benzoate, Lactic Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid.
